response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to share this treasure. We propose a fair transaction of $950,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its market value but also acknowledges its importance to you. We hope this offer aligns with your expectations and enables us to facilitate a mutually beneficial exchange.", "product_price": 950000}
